channel.title: Posts on Classic
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Classic

item.title: Systems
item.description: It's difficult to observe a system, especially from inside of it. A system doesn't exist as a thing-in-itself per-say, but the relationships and interactions between things within the system. Observation of the system is especially difficult the more complex and larger it is, obviously, but to observe a system from within it as a complex actor is nearly impossible. As an actor within a system, conscious of the system, one has knowledge of what it is that is necessarily incomplete: a member cannot encompass the set.

item.title: Markdown Guide
item.description: An h1 header Paragraphs are separated by a blank line. 2nd paragraph. Italic, bold, and monospace. Itemized lists look like: this one that one the other one Note that — not considering the asterisk — the actual text content starts at 4-columns in. Block quotes are written like so. They can span multiple paragraphs, if you like. Use 3 dashes for an em-dash. Use 2 dashes for ranges (ex.
